title: Angel One | SDE 2 - Frontend | Remote / Bangalore, India | Accepted
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3.5 years (full time)
Current comp: ~ INR 26 LPA (22 base + bonus + esops)
Prior Experience: Product Based Company
Date of the Offer: Dec '23
Company: Angel One
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Remote / Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 35 LPA
Performance Bonus: 3.5 LPA (ME Rating: 10% of base salary). Can go upto: (EE Rating - 15%, OP Rating- 30%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 38.5L
Benefits: Standard benefits, INR 700 mobile reimbursement per month. One time INR 7k for WFH setup. Medical Insurance for spouse + children, have to pay additional premium for parents.

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4751509/Angel-One-or-SDE-2-Frontend-or-Remote-Bangalore-India-or-Offer

Accepted the offer.

title: Wayfair | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B-Tech ECE 2021, Teir - 1 College
Years of Experience: 2.7 Yrs
Prior Experience: Top E commerce Company
Previous Comp - 20 base + 2 bonus + 7L annual stocks
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: SDE - 2
Location: Bangalore, Karnataka
Salary: INR 42L

Total comp first year(Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 42L
Benefits: No extra benefits, everything was part of my base salary.

Another Offer - 

https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/4749695/Google-or-L3-or-SWE-II-or-Bangalore

title: Google | L3 |  SWE-II | Bangalore
content:
Education: B-Tech ECE 2021, Teir - 1 College
Years of Experience: 2.7 Yrs
Prior Experience: Top E commerce Company 
Previous Comp - 20 base + 2 bonus + 7L annual stocks
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE-II
Location: Bangalore, Karnataka
Salary: INR 23L 
Signing Bonus: INR 2L
Stock bonus: $ 44K stock grant vested over 4 yrs ( 38 , 32 , 18, 12 )
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp first year(Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 23+2+13.6(stocks) + 3.45 (perfBonus) = INR 42.05L
Benefits: Standard Google benefits (PF, Gratuity, Cabs, Insurance, Meal)
Other details: Negotiated a lot had better offers from startups but recruiter didn't move much on numbers. Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.


Other Offer - 

Google - https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/4749709/Wayfair-or-SDE-2-or-Bangalore
